website_summaries.verdict: If you take a lot of photos and have a Motorola Moto Z phone, the Hasselblad is a great add-on to have, as long as you're looking for a big zoom instead of better-than-phone photo quality.
pros: The Moto Mods add-on architecture is an intelligent way to add a camera and the Hasselblad True Zoom is attractive, well designed and adds a convenient 10x zoom
cons: The camera software can be annoying and it's hard to control framing when zoomed all the way in, especially for moving subjects
The video quality isn't great, either

customer_reviews.title: The True Validation For Moto Mods
customer_reviews.text: Moto mods sound like a dumb gimmick but this one certainly is not. When LG came out with the modular system with the g5 it was awful. It did not hot swap and everything was a pain. With Motorola the ease of use was awesome. I got the camera for when I went on vacation and it did not disappoint. Not a single failure occured for me on this 7000+ Mile road trip. From 100°+ to low 30°s it operated with out fail. A few thousand stunning pictures later and I am still just tickled with the purchase and would and do recommend it to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: 10x Zoom, Optical stabilizer (perfect, because Moto Z Play doesn't have) and Xenon Flash. Simply Amazing! In those photos you can see a picture without zoom and a picture with 10x.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Bellizzi

customer_reviews.title: Most modern phones take decent pics, but not this good.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the True Zoom adds a bit of bulk to my phone, but way less than packing my DSLRs around. No, it doesn't offer the range of the DSLR either. But back to back photos of a red miniature Pom proved its worth it. The Z3 play took a good looking snapshot, but as soon as you try to enlarge the pic its a pixilated fuzzy mess. Same shot just seconds later with the Hasselblad and I can mag in as far as I want, every individual hair is distinct and sharp. That is an image quality I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good for most situations.
customer_reviews.text: This is a refirb model. It's a little glitchy. BUT I love it. Durable. I was sad that it doesn't do full night moon photos well. The photos are taken with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Josh / joe

customer_reviews.title: fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: fantastic camera. Learn how to use it before you really need to, professional settings take a little learning curve. Occasional software updates will require some adjustments but can enhance photos
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I love the product, a lot of adjustments are possible within the lens and the camera together and they play well together. Nice quality of both the phone and the photo. Convenient to be able to put it on the phone and go out doing nature stuff, playing with the kids, family events, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Turns phone into super camera
customer_reviews.text: Love it, turns my, Moto z play 2 into a super camera,, no other phone on the market can take pics like mine, the pictures I took were miles away keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: IzzyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice pictures but overall pokey performance.
customer_reviews.text: It takes nice daytime pictures and integrates well with the phone. Due to its size and battery consumption, lack of stabilization, and poor image quality in low light, I would recommend just carrying a separate point and shoot digital with equivalent zoom to get better overall performance at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: klrman

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently went to a Dodger baseball game. My seats were great, but by using this camera mod, they became even greater. The pictures I good were very good. I love this phone and it's versatility with mods!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: No longer working. $159.00 for nothing. Used it once in June wanted to use it a month ago, didn't work. Tried on several different motoz phones and says error, restart. Still, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: pjm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just acquired today & it works great. Makes zooming in & out to take pictures much easier with my phone which is what I wanted. This used item was much cheaper then new, & in solid 96 percent condition as advertised, & still came with directions. The only thing I don't like is that there is no safety strap to carry out of the case & since the phone has to be out of the protection case, it's a little scary for me as a droping hazard. There is a slight mini handle on the side for good gripping. It also came with a mini carrying case. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Izzy Schurr

customer_reviews.title: The mod is worth the money if you actually use it.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this mod. She takes it everywhere on her nature walks so she can bring home some sweet nature pictures. It's not much better than the phone camera. The main advantage over the phone's camera is the true optical zoom. It actually zooms on the picture. Whereas the phone can only zoom on the picture of the picture. But to be honest these phones have one of the best rear cameras in tech world. So you can basically become an advanced photographer with just a simple mod.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy From That One Place

customer_reviews.title: You wont carry your dig
customer_reviews.text: This lets you choose to shot in regular jpeg or RAW format or both atbthe same time. RAW photos take up huge amount of space because it is not compressed which makes it the format of choice for post editing. You have full usenof your phone so snap it on before the event and it still fits in you pocket. I haven't use my digital camera since. I would definitely recommend this mod. Good pics, nice stable image, nice video, and most of all convenient.
customer_reviews.author: ohioplayer1177

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, came used
customer_reviews.text: Came used even though I bought new. Was scratched up and would not work. Clicks onto phone but then only an error message appears. None of the guides or product support were helpful. Have requested a return and new product, will update when the new one comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over heats way to easily when in use and will lock up phone!
customer_reviews.text: It over heats up our phone while in use. Almost always when videoing it will lock your phone up and you'll have to restart it. I would not purchase this again ever. Unless a substantial change was proven to me. Also need a safety case to go around phone and camera with a safety handle/strap to secure and keep it from dropping/separating and cracking screen on phone. The worst!!!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Stone

customer_reviews.title: I dreamed of this feature my whole life, but as it arrives, I wonder if it's already gone.
customer_reviews.text: The camera, the hardware, is a work of art. The software, takes some manipulation. Not different than any other digital or analog camera with a lot of features. What makes this so useful, is that I can turn my most accessible device into a professional grade tool. But it seems like Motorola may be ditching this line of hardware. It's not mainstream, but there is a market. It may never be your largest market, but it could be the most dedicated one. Less waste. More functionally with backwards compatibility. All with the power of a very practical, and powerful, camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Huynh

customer_reviews.title: very nice little toy but if it worked
customer_reviews.text: i like it bought it as a gift but when it worked ( for only this time) it was great then everytime you want to use it on the phone battery it says restart camera every time, before it use to work when plugging the phone to charge but now not even when you plug the phone, it is not working. but when it worked it was great! came on time!
customer_reviews.author: Dany

customer_reviews.title: Hasselblad Review with comparison images .pdf
customer_reviews.text: I like the this Mod first because I always wanted a Hasselblad camera. Very happy with this Mod. I've seen many horrible reviews about the camera and feel compelled to make and publish my own test. I'm a serious photographer for 35 years. I've never put much value in cell phone cameras, although they do a fantastic job if your only going to view images on a phone or a computer screen. But for printing 8X10 or 18X20 images you need more pixels than a cell phone provide provides. The Hasselblad Mod broke the mold and I hope we see more like it. See my review for the proof.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Augello

customer_reviews.title: Nice optical zoom
customer_reviews.text: I got this mostly for the optical zoom and it certainly delivers on that (10x). Otherwise a fairly standard point-and-shoot with an average sensor size for the form factor. The ease of use is a big plus, too. If you have a specific use for it I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: koopaking

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this. Pictures are unbelievable compared to just her phone. Came with a case that fit both this and the phone (while attached).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moto Z True Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and it worked fast right away. I captured the sunset while walking back to my condo from mailbox. Easy to use. Oh and food pics, wow.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cappy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Everytime I use it in people want to know what it is and how can they get one.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and I truly pleased. I can now say I own a hasselblad.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Finomonal pictures like pro
customer_reviews.text: Moto Mods Is a great idea, buy the hasselblad mod is even a better one at that because now your cellphone transform into a high end hasselblad camera that normally u wouldn't think would ever be in your price range. But with Motorola Moto mods now it is and picture are finally finomonal
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Maximo Hill

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Had great quality of pictures, zooming, video, flash was amazing. One major fall back is the fact that after three days of use, the camera got stuck open, and wouldn't show any pictures through the viewfinder. Still registered that it was connected, just dead. Motorola said they weren't allowed to tell me if that issue had happened before
customer_reviews.author: Krista Corley

customer_reviews.title: More like hassle blahh
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent camera option - while it worked. I used it for 2 baseball games this summer. Easy peasy. Good pictures, kind of. I stored it safely in it's case. 2 months later, I go to use it again, unsuccessfully. Nothing. It's not my phone or a software issue, as my other mods work fine ( speaker & projector ) Too late for return!😔
customer_reviews.author: Taryn o.

customer_reviews.title: Just don't get it.
customer_reviews.text: I really wouldn't recommend this product. The default camera application makes this a bad purchase. From huge delay between pushing the button and actually taking the picture, to not being able to focus 15 feet away from something (while zoomed in)... I actually got it because I thought it was a cool concept, which it is, but it's limited severely by the phone (Motorola Z3 Play).
customer_reviews.author: Kantis C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I wanted something that was easy to use and not an "extra" carry round. This works great. Still getting use to it and all it can do but very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Used product!
customer_reviews.text: It came used , i payed for a new product and got one that came with the package already open, i am definitely returning , do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I waited for the price to go down. After I've use this for while. I would have paid full price. It's just a better zoom for your camera.
customer_reviews.author: morgan davis

customer_reviews.title: This unit really works great...
customer_reviews.text: takes very nice pictures of very high quality. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on to my Motorola phone
customer_reviews.text: Great add-on to my Motorola phone. When I can't get the shots with the already really good camera on the phone, I can just snap this on and use the powerful zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The product worked for 2 months and now doesn't connect to my phone. Would not recommend buying your product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Situationally good
customer_reviews.text: For anything not requiring zoom, the camera on the Moto Z3 Play is superior. When it comes to zooming, this mod is a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy reconditioned merchandise.
customer_reviews.text: It just stopped working. I used it 4 times..Do not ever buy this product. Piece of junk and I can't fond any help as return window was 30 days..
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction and fast ship time
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. Great transaction and fast ship time. No complaints. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera works way better than I thought it would very happy
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Harless

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures
customer_reviews.text: This thing... Amazing. Verizon had it for half the price, had I known...
customer_reviews.author: ineedanewaddress

customer_reviews.title: Quality doesn't have to be compromised!
customer_reviews.text: Truly remarkable to have this type of quality, especially when its part of your product. I'm in the auto appraisal business and to be able to show such detail only helps to announce my expertise.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Zapien

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: For a used product, the mod is in better than expected condition with no scratches or scuffs, lined up and connected correctly, and the picture quality is as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to Italy. I was able to take some beautiful pictures! Far warning, your battery will drain using this, but as long as you recharge it's fine. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Best Mod I own
customer_reviews.text: Best Mod I own! Pictures are fantastic as well as video! I don't bring any other cameras now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera mod!
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use it but it's pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. The resolution is lower than the standard camera but the picture quality is significantly higher, especially in low light settings. I use it primarily at work for documentation purposes but also use it for events/personal use and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The pictures came out perfect and it's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Camera way better than the phone can. Keeps freezing and having to be reset.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does freeze up a bit, but un-clipping it fixes the issue....
customer_reviews.author: cptcavemn76

customer_reviews.title: Save your money get a real camera.
customer_reviews.text: The focus moves to much delay when you take a picture the color is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Not real close zoom, but definitely a little more zoom
customer_reviews.text: It does work well, I just thought zoom lense would bring things in closer than it does.
customer_reviews.author: WOODY

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures and easy to handle. The biggest advantage of this camera is that you can now do a zoom with a clear pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to connect with my Moto Z2 play and really it works well. The zooming capability has been great and it is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Regz

customer_reviews.title: Good camera gadget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Alaska this Summer wher I didn't want to be dragging around my regular camera and lenses. For that it worked very nicely as pics of caribou and bears in the distance could be blown up with fairly good resolution. It did seem to drain the battery fairly quickly although not prohibitively. I had two Power packs that I could slip on towards the end of a day. They unfortunately took quite a long time to recharge the phone in the meantime - alot of missed pics as I was waiting. Overall I was very happy to have this instead of a big duffle for a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The pictures come out amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The pictures come out amazing. I just need to play around with the settings more to feel more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R. Helt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: no instruction manual , hard to hold needs some sort of a strap
customer_reviews.author: Laurie  Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great pics!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel pics. Saved me from having to carry a separate camera and pic quality was great!
customer_reviews.author: M Blaisdell

customer_reviews.title: Great out of the gate, died in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: At first, it worked great, too amazing pictures etc. However less than a year and it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: this is the best deal one could imagine
customer_reviews.text: Considering that Hasselblads cost 10k+, this is the best deal one could imagine. The pictures transpire the quality of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy to use and take great pictures and videos
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Botterill

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but BIG.
customer_reviews.text: Zoom function is great. Camera is a bit slow and unresponsive. Lighting is terrible compared to the original phone camera...comes with all the lenses necessary for optical zoom. Very bulky to keep on the phone...good luck finding a belt holster for it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Faris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoor use and indoor. Best suited for getting scenery and the zoom is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.

customer_reviews.title: The pictures disappear on the phone until the camera is ...
customer_reviews.text: The pictures disappear on the phone until the camera is reattached. However the quality of the photos are spectacular. You can't beat the functionality for the price. It pairs well with Google card board for panoramic photos.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Edit: fixed the bent ring Metal ring around lense was bent pretty far out... I might change my review if I can fix this if not I would like to send this back for a replacement. Phone zoom vs camera zoom
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: expensive toy but very cool
customer_reviews.text: ok this is an expensive but very cool toy for the moto Z! what other phone can turn into a pretty full fledged camera with style to match?
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: I used to own three digital cameras, I gave ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to own three digital cameras, I gave away two of them since this is just as capable as either and much more convenient. (The other is waterproof which my Z2 Play is not)
customer_reviews.author: Scott the Laser Fixer

customer_reviews.title: It is like I need a tripod
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed by the zoom but it make it difficult to stay on the subject u want in the picture....Much to touchy...It is like I need a tripod....So for that reason only a 3
customer_reviews.author: not as good

customer_reviews.title: it is not bad. Sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it is not bad. Sometimes, when I put it into my phone, "camera error, please restart camera..." again and again, until I reboot my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic defects were too overwhelming. Large blob of epoxy and dent on case.
customer_reviews.text: Product was functional but they weren't kidding about the cosmetic defects, a large blob of epoxy and a slight dent on the rim of the case. Product felt like it needed a good wipe down when received, slightly oily. Arrived earlier than expected which is good. Would I buy a used model again? "Probably not."
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty great Mod
customer_reviews.text: I love the optical zoom on this Moto Mod. It makes taking photos with my phone more fun! While super close zooms require a pretty steady hand, the image quality is so much better than using the digital zoom on the phone. So far, I've got nothing but good things to say. It won't replace a truly good point and shoot camera, but for an amateur like myself that doesn't really like lugging around a full sized camera, this works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. HolstTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: Really great camera addition for my Moto Z2 Play! Very clear details on the zoomed in photos. Great versatility for times I don't want to bring my real camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Not great sports multiple pics camera on phone does better but zoom, portable video love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I expected. Optical zoom is primary selling ...
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I expected. Optical zoom is primary selling point, otherwise a neat toy! Fast shipping and well packaged. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Gene Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good Mod if you set the right expectations
customer_reviews.text: Closer to 3.5 stars but still a good product as long as you know exactly what you're getting. It's essentially a zoom and xenon flash and the ability to take raw photos. If you have a DSLR or a mirrorless or a good point and shoot then this won't replace it. If you want to add an optical zoom to your phone then this is a really cool mod.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Maryanski

customer_reviews.title: More user friendly, please
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star but can't use it with an otter box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The mod worked only 3 days before software issues made it impossible to launch. 10x optical zoom and high quality photos are not worth the time you'll spend calling Moto support centers (if you can even contact them).
customer_reviews.author: Maxx Barraco

customer_reviews.title: She just loves the portability and easy access in using this very inventive attachment device
customer_reviews.text: The Motorola True Zoom Camera was given to my wife as a Christmas Gift. She just loves the portability and easy access in using this very inventive attachment device. The quality in taking pictures are phenomenal and high resolution in its detail.
customer_reviews.author: Dr David

customer_reviews.title: Camera still not working
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my second camera. I returned the first one because there was an error that would come up intermittently. I am still having the same error come up on my phone with this camera too. Any idea what is going on?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointing and unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Really don't even bother with this true zoom. I will admit that it is cool to be able to zoom in a lot with your phone but the very slow performance in focusing and the added bulk is really not worth the money for this mod. I really can't find a good thing to say about this other than it being a nice conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mod is great!!!! I buy it on Black Friday and the price was awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality is awesome but expected more functionality. Its all depends on software
customer_reviews.author: Emin Mastizada

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money....
customer_reviews.text: Save your money....A $100 point and shoot camera takes better pictures. Focus is terrible...almost impossible to use. The advantage of having a "sort of DSLR" camera mod is ruined by the interface: you have to select RAW EACH time you open the camera, it just plain stupid. You also have to change the scene type every time, it goes back to "Auto" when close the camera app. Took hundreds of pictures on vacation with it, 90% were blurry...wish I was still within 30-days, would return it....
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. the quality is unbelievable. We have sold our point and shoot cameras and have replaced them with this Moto Mod. Best Moto Mod Yet. MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the zoom feature struggled to get a clear picture even in raw mode most pictures weren't of good quality. Save your money don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my wife loves taking pictures and was so excited to give it to her for her Birthday, but sadly it only took 30 minutes to figure out it was junk, not only do you have to remove the case of your phone to install it, the zoom feature struggled to get a clear picture even in raw mode most pictures weren't of good quality. Save your money don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just receivedmy camera mod today. I was excited to get it. Unfortunately once I opened this up. There is something that looks and feels like super glue. This is very upsetting that someone packaged this and didn't think to take this one out of service and get a clean one. There is no way they missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I'm sending it back
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to use it I want it for a camera I have a I phone I'm lost How do I shoot in raw no instructions If I can't get help I will send it back
customer_reviews.author: jerrysphotos

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that I am Impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am Impressed... Motorola Hasselblad True Zoom Camera for Moto Z4. Photo Quality is Excellent. I carry in my shirt pocket, it add a little weight but worth it. I need high quality photos w/o the hassle of carrying a big camera. You must have the proper case and hand lanyard otherwise it a bit hard to hang on too. Totally pleased and price was only $100 as a package deal.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: This is the coolest fun feature to my new phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest fun feature to my new phone. I ordered this through Amazon at about half the original purchase price. It was used, but only one little scratch was noted on the outside edge of the camera mod. Otherwise, it works just as expected and I have really enjoyed using it. I took it to Colorado and was able to snap pics that were really great! Fun mod.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: oh my goodness! I love this! I am stoked I got it on Cyber Monday for such a great deal! The quality of the photos is amazing & the ease of manual settings is really nice. Many of my friends have told me that they now have camera envy. If you have a Motorola ZPlay, you will be glad if you get this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Moto Z Force suddenly dead - coincidence?
customer_reviews.text: My phone seemed to work perfectly prior to attaching this new camera mod to it, just one time. I detached the camera and put it in its storage pouch. Immediately, the phone battery no longer lasted in standby for even a day. I attempted clearing cache memory, then a factory reset on my phone and it won't even detect the sim card or wifi, so my phone is now unusable and stuck in initial setup mode. My wife is mad and thinks I should file a claim for it. My phone is 2 years old - should I? Can I?
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price for a small difference in quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is only a bit better than your regular camera. I did like taking videos with it. Zooming in and out was a lot easier with the camera. I highly disliked that it drained my battery so quick. I went from 50% to 0% without a warning; my phone ended up powering down and the camera was not able to close its lense. The camera cannot be charged and I think it needs it on battery in order to be functional.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Koelsch

customer_reviews.title: Good Lens But missing a wrist strap and tripod screw
customer_reviews.text: It's missing something. It's missing a simple wrist strap that you would expect to find on any camera. Boy, it is so risky to not drop the Hasselbald camera mod attached to the Moto Z cell phone while reaching out for a selfie. Or fiddling with it on a boat watching wales. Or.....you name it. Ouch that would be really expensive. The next update to the camera mod should simply be a wrist Strap. Don't forget about a tripod screw. This mod attached to a Moto Z is a serious combination. Current design is cheaping it out.
customer_reviews.author: whitelinerr

customer_reviews.title: This moto is the next best thing. Takes good pictures and has a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Samsung galaxy S4 Zoom and got tired of waiting for its successor. This moto is the next best thing. Takes good pictures and has a great optical zoom. My only complaint is I cant find a phone case that will fit the mod as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abate

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Great Mod Pros Zoom and picture quality along with some filters your Moto can't do. Cons The flash is a little bright in low lighting areas, makes object or person alittle white, then actual color. And just recently pixel spots at bottom of pictures (they are only there with mod) they are only the size of pin holes. (I have tested with and without mod on phone, and it's only with mod on). Haven't dropped it, just minor use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gierczak

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: I will be on the lookout the next time I buy a cell phone not to buy a phone that has a poor quality camera very low volume and they sell individual mods to improve all of the features for to improve the quality on the camera. after receiving this hasselblad mod all I can say is thank God I didn't spend the original price of 299.
customer_reviews.author: Chazlock

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, works well
customer_reviews.text: This camera works well with my phone Motorola Z4, it takes very nice photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love this mod for my Moto Z. It takes really good pictures. It comes with a nice little case to store it in. The case also has a wrist strap so when I know I will be using it I attach it to the phone and the phone and camera mod fit in the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a Moto Z2 force that I was intending to purchase this for and it didnt work on it. My friend has a Z3 play and it worked fine. So I think something us upnwith my Z2. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Zooooooom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera in almost every way. The only reason I dinged a star (I would have preferred a half-star) is because even with the shutter on the slowest setting low-light flashless pictures have less definition than the on-phone camera. All other conditions are vastly superior, especially the optical zoom.
customer_reviews.author: M. K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mod
customer_reviews.text: Initially the camera was hard to sync with the phone. Required several restarts. Once it was working it's been great! Low light is not perfect but not too bad either. It's really cool to be able to zoom in on pictures and see detail instead of pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A bit slow to focus in Low light but overall a very handy Mod without having to buy Compact
customer_reviews.text: A bit slow to focus in Low light but overall a very handy Mod without having to buy Compact I have Nikon D500 and D750 for the serious stuff but this Mod is handy to have in the Car for On the spot pics that require Optical Zoom which works really well -- But you can use this camera for most close in work as well Serious Compact Cameras such as the Sony DSC-RX100 IV or VA indoor low aperture work or Sony DSC-RX100 VI for long zoom might be better for 1000 USD +
customer_reviews.author: mmoore

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful improvement over an already amazing phone camera! My daughter is in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful improvement over an already amazing phone camera! My daughter is in LOVE! It adds features to the phone camera and easily recognizes it as soon as she snaps it on her phone. The fine details in photos are incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Buy new, works amazing! Beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Device it's self is amazing. I ordered a "used like new" that was so gunked up I had to bring it to a local camera repair place. They loved it, and it takes amazing photos now that it is cleaned and working.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

product_meta.title: Motorola Hasselblad True Zoom Camera for Moto Z Droid, Moto Z Force Droid, Moto Z Play Droid
product_meta.description: Style:Camera for Moto Z DroidThe Hasselblad True Zoom camera with 10X optical zoom adds an advanced imaging experience to your phone in a snap. Now you can use your smartphone to capture images in ways that have never been possible, fueling your creativity and letting you share the brilliant results
